job.title: Senior Software Engineers (RoR)
job.description: <p><strong>SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEERs (RoR)</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>ZYMR Inc. has an immediate requirement to fulfill for our newest Customer.&nbsp;The project involves working with a fast-growing, tier-1, pre-IPO Silicon Valley Energy startup that was established almost 10 years ago and has raised more than $100M in funding so far.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>We are looking for experienced Ruby on Rails (Preferred), Django Platform Developers:</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities and Duties</strong></p><ul><li>Write platform code, services, and components</li><li>Design &amp; develop microservices for components</li><li>Responsible for design and implementation, test automation, and other SDLC activities.</li><li>Gather and analyze requirements and convert them into concrete technical tasks with effort estimates.</li><li>Cross-border project experience is a plus.</li><li>Perform code reviews, test case reviews to meet high-quality standards.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Qualifications and Skills</strong></p><ul><li>6+ years building scalable applications with web frameworks like Ruby on Rails, Django, etc. (RoR preferred)</li><li>6+ years experience with OOP design and building REST APIs</li><li>Proficient in designing microservices with containerization tools Docker and Kubernetes</li><li>Experience with UI frameworks like Angular or ReactJS</li><li>Strong background in Data Structures and Algorithms</li><li>Expert with Relational Databases, like MySQL or PostgreSQL</li><li>Experience with Web Services (REST)</li><li>Experience working in cloud environments, AWS preferred</li><li>Experience with SOA &amp; Event-Driven Architecture.</li><li>Knowledge of Caching and Messaging technologies like Redis, RabbitMQ, Kafka.</li><li>Experience with Linux development and runtime environments</li><li>Experience with Agile / SCRUM methodology for product development (TDD, CI)</li><li><strong>Education:</strong> Bachelor’s in computer science or equivalent degree</li><li>4+ years at any leading SaaS firm - experience with the energy domain a big plus.</li></ul><p><br></p>
